page.topic: Repeat column headings above summary values
page.description: Check to repeat column headings above the summary values.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Repeat column headings above summary values]* property can be used to repeat column headings before the summary values are shown (as shown in the image below). This is useful when you have a Grid with a lot of rows and the page must be scrolled to get to see the summary values.

description.p: To turn on this feature, check the *[ui:Repeat column headings above summary values]* property.
